      • create

        public abstract Collection<File> create(InputManagerParams params)
                                 throws FilesProviderException
        Creates or provides a collection of files.
        Parameters:
        params - parameters influencing how input-files are obtained.
        Returns:
        the collection of files from the provider
        Throws:
        FilesProviderException

      • rootDirectory

        public abstract Optional<Path> rootDirectory(InputContextParams inputContext)
                                      throws FilesProviderException
        A root directory for these files, if it exists.

        Any file that is part of the collection returned by this provider, must exist inside this directory (either directly or in any nested subdirectories).

        Parameters:
        inputContext - TODO
        Returns:
        a path to this directory.
        Throws:
        FilesProviderException
